reporting-org.narrative: The Queen Elizabeth Diamond Jubilee Trust

description.narrative: Each year for four years the programme honours 60 exceptional young people from across the Commonwealth with a Queen’s Young Leaders Award. These inspirational leaders are working on a wide variety of important issues including tackling climate change, providing education for girls and improving maternal health.

participating-org.narrative: The Queen Elizabeth Diamond Jubilee Trust
The University of Cambridge Institute of Continuing Education
